headline: Kraft Heinz KegChup Puts Brand Experimentation At Center Of Game Day
summary: HEINZ, part of Kraft Heinz (NasdaqGS:KHC), has launched a limited-edition 114 oz stainless steel "KegChup" keg of ketchup. The product launch is timed to coincide with football's biggest game and is aimed at watch party consumers. The launch is supported by social media activity and a limited-edition giveaway to build brand engagement. Kraft Heinz, trading at $24.58, is putting brand visibility front and center with this KegChup release around a major viewing event. The stock is up 4.6%...
